name: @squonk/sdf-parser
description: A parser for SDF files with streaming support

scripts.lint: eslint --cache --max-warnings=0 --resolve-plugins-relative-to="$(pnpm c --user get MONOREPO && echo '../../libs/eslint-config' || echo './node_modules/@squonk/eslint-config')"
scripts.format: eslint --fix --cache --max-warnings=0 --resolve-plugins-relative-to="$(pnpm c --user get MONOREPO && echo '../../libs/eslint-config' || echo './node_modules/@squonk/eslint-config')"
scripts.format:all: eslint --fix --cache --max-warnings=0 --resolve-plugins-relative-to="$(pnpm c --user get MONOREPO && echo '../../libs/eslint-config' || echo './node_modules/@squonk/eslint-config')" .
